tool_description: The API is designed to generate download links for files hosted on Terabox
name: terabox direct download
title: terabox direct download

api_list.name: docs
api_list.description:
API Description:

The API is designed to generate download links for files hosted on Terabox. It accepts a URL parameter containing the Terabox share link and returns a direct download link to the file. The API processes the request, extracts necessary information from the Terabox share link, and retrieves the download link from the Terabox API. It then returns the direct download link as the response.
